restaurantInfo.name: Shpendi
restaurantInfo.description: Experience the magic of Italian cuisine with recipes that combine tradition and elegance. Each dish is prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients, from pasta, meat, salads and pizzas.

about.title: About Shpendi
about.description: Welcome to Shpendi, where traditional Italian cuisine is combined with contemporary service. Our restaurant brings the true flavors of Italy and creates special experiences for all those who love Italian cuisine and its traditions.

premium.title: Premium Quality
premium.description: Fresh and carefully selected ingredients for an authentic Italian taste in every dish.

tradition.title: Family Tradition
tradition.description: Our recipes have been passed down through generations, preserving the authentic taste of Italian cuisine.

love.title: Made with Love
love.description: Every dish is prepared with passion and attention to detail, ensuring an unforgettable dining experience.

fresh.title: Fresh Daily
fresh.description: All our ingredients are fresh and our dishes are prepared daily to guarantee the highest quality.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Shpendi is more than a restaurant – it's a place that combines traditional and Italian cuisine.
With meticulously prepared recipes, from pastas, salads, meats to pizzas, we offer an unforgettable experience that embodies the warmth and elegance of our hospitality in every detail.

Skerdilajd Llagami – SHPENDI was martyred on 29.06.2001. After two years, on 29.06.2003, Pizzeria SHPENDI was opened. The name and date are not just a memory, but a living symbol of remembrance and pride for his figure and sacrifice. This makes Pizzeria SHPENDI not only a place for food, but also a place of remembrance, honor and respect.

menuData.title: Our Menu
menuData.description: Discover our rich menu of authentic Italian dishes, carefully prepared from the freshest and highest quality ingredients. From traditional Italian specialties to modern culinary creations, each dish offers a unique tasting experience that reflects the richness and sophistication of Italian cuisine.
menuData.dietaryText: We're happy to accommodate vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free requests. Please inform your server about any allergies or dietary restrictions.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Hear from our satisfied customers about their dining experiences at Shpendi. We take pride in delivering exceptional food and service that keeps our guests coming back for more.

reviews.name: Евгения
reviews.comment: Great place. Very tasty pasta and wonderful staff. We really enjoyed having lunch with you. Delicious coffee. Thank you for everything!

reviews.name: Valerii Liebiediev
reviews.comment: Delicious cafe and pleasant staff. I recommend this establishment.

reviews.name: Rexhep Veseli
reviews.comment: If you're looking for choices and delicious food, you won't go wrong with your visit.

cta.header: Ready to Create Your Own Memorable Experience?
cta.subheader: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who have made Shpendi their favorite dining destination. Book your table today and taste the difference authentic Italian cuisine makes.

contact.subheader: Ready to experience authentic Italian cuisine? Contact us for reservations or any inquiries.

footer.description: Experience the finest Italian dining with our carefully crafted dishes made from the freshest ingredients. Every meal tells a story of heritage and flavor.
